modal.timeout-header: Unfortunately, you have to log in again
modal.timeout-p1: There was no screen activity for at least {{ minutes }} minutes.
modal.timeout-p2-b: or go to the DigiD homepage
modal.timeout-p3-li1: Close and open the browser again
modal.timeout-p3-li2: Or delete old cookies and your browser history
modal.timeout-p3-li3: Or log in on another browser
modal.warning-header: Please note: The maximum login time is almost reached.
modal.warning-p: Press the spacebar or click the button to stay logged in.
modal.2fa-warning-a: You have set that you always want to log in using at least two steps, like the DigiD app.
modal.2fa-warning-b: Are you sure you want to deactivate the DigiD app?
